articles.content: Actor Kamal Hasan took to social media platform X on Sunday to share heartfelt birthday wishes for India's renowned musician and composer Isaignani Ilaiyaraaja and globally acclaimed director Anbuth … [+2273 chars]

articles.author: Sounak Mukhopadhyay
articles.title: T-Series subscriber count no longer highest on YouTube: 26-year-old influencer beats Bhushan Kumar’s channel | Today News - Mint
articles.description: The 26-year-old influencer surpassed T-Series as the most-subscribed YouTube channel. Bhushan Kumar leads T-Series, a Bollywood music company.
articles.content: MrBeast has become the most-subscribed YouTube channel, overtaking T-Series. Earlier in 2023, the YouTuber, whose real name is Jimmy Donaldson, promised to support fellow influencer Pewdiepie by achi… [+2111 chars]
